subject: Football
lead_paragraph: On Sunday, the Giants became the first team in N.F.L. history to blow two double-digit leads in two games to open the season. And quarterback Eli Manning played a prominent role in giving away the game.
snippet: On Sunday, the Giants became the first team in N.F.L. history to blow two double-digit leads in two games to open the season. And quarterback Eli Manning played a prominent role in giving away the game.
